name: Achievement Hunter: Witch
description:
Achievement Hunter: Witch

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the witch who wants to stop the enemies who are trying to destroy your city.
You do not have any allies. There are only you and a huge number of enemies.
Fight for your city, increase your skill and prevent invasion of enemies into your kitchen.

Game features:
  • 5000 ACHIEVEMENTS
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Cartoon style
  • Fearless protagonist
